Html:
Hi I just installed Mvvmlight  4.0.23.4.

I created new Mvvmlight project in visual studio 2012 express. Just right after I created new project I tried to run it but right in the splash screen the application stop and this is the error:

Cannot find a Resource with the Name/Key ApplicationHeaderForegroundThemeBrush

 

I used visual studio 2012 express in Windows 8 RP

Hi,

MVVM Light V4.0.23.4 applies to Windows 8 RTM only. The issue you indicate was a change from Win8 RP to RTM.

Cheers

Laurent
so where can I get the installer for Windows 8 RP?

I don't support Win8 RP anymore. I can pass you an installer but it's at your own risk. Please send me an email to Laurent at galasoft dot ch.

Cheers
Laurent

Ok, I already sent you email regarding this.

 

Thank you
